sentences.sContent: While such ways of traveling certainly have their benefits, there are also undoubtedly some disadvantages.
sentences.sContent_eng: While such ways of traveling certainly have their benefits, there are also undoubtedly some disadvantages.
sentences.sCn: 这种旅行方式当然有它们的长处所在，但毫无疑问也有一些缺憾。

sentences.sContent: ...Some of this is undoubtedly due to The Great Recession...
